Whistle Detector
================

Creating a new Whistle Detector
-------------------------------

  
From either the _**File>Add Modules**_ menu or the popup menu on the PAMGuard data model view, select new Whistle Detector

You will be prompted to enter a name for the new Whistle Detector.

  

[Previous: Overview](whistleDetector_Overview.html)
